data.eml:eml: Tyrannosaurs from the Late Cretaceous of western Canada

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book / thesis / monograph Russell, Dale A. (1970): Tyrannosaurs from the Late Cretaceous of western Canada. Ottawa: National Museum of Natural Sciences, Publications in Palaeontology, No. 1, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.1040973
